flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
It’s drowzy in daytime, but flies
off in the evening in big groups.
No one knows where they go.

It carries people and Pokémon
when it flies. But since it only
drifts, it can end up anywhere.

At dusk, swarms of them are
carried aloft on winds. When
noticed, they suddenly vanish.

It can generate and release gas
within its body. That’s how it can
control the altitude of its drift.

It can generate and release gas
within its body. That’s how it can
control the altitude of its drift.

Des nuées de Grodrive dérivent
dans le ciel au crépuscule. Ils
disparaissent dès qu’on les voit.

At dusk, swarms of them are
carried aloft on winds. When
noticed, they suddenly vanish.

Des nuées de Grodrive dérivent
dans le ciel au crépuscule. Ils
disparaissent dès qu’on les voit.

At dusk, swarms of them are
carried aloft on winds. When
noticed, they suddenly vanish.

They carry people and Pokémon,
but the wind can catch them, so
there can’t be a fixed destination.

They carry people and Pokémon,
but the wind can catch them, so
there can’t be a fixed destination.

ひとや　ポケモンを　のせて　とぶが
かぜに　ながされているだけなので
どこへ　とんでいくか　わからない。

사람이나 포켓몬을 태우고 날지만
바람에 떠밀려 다닐 뿐이므로
어디로 날아갈지 모른다.

Il peut embarquer des gens et des Pokémon, mais
nul ne sait où il va atterrir car il ne fait que flotter.

Es trägt Menschen und Pokémon im Flug.
Da es sich aber nur vom Wind tragen lässt,
weiß man nie, wo es hingeht.

Transporta a gente y a Pokémon volando, pero, como
se deja llevar, puede acabar en cualquier sitio.

Vola trascinando persone e Pokémon. Poiché si fa
portare dal vento, non si sa dove vada a finire.

It carries people and Pokémon when it flies.
But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.

人や　ポケモンを　乗せて　飛ぶが
風に　流されているだけなので
どこへ　飛んでいくか　わからない。

ひるまは　ねぼけて　うかんでいるが
ゆうがた　たいぐんで　とんでいく。
いきさきは　だれも　しらない。

낮에는 잠이 덜 깨어 떠 있지만
저녁 무렵에는 큰 무리를 지어
날아간다. 목적지는 아무도 모른다.

Il somnole la journée et s’envole en grands groupes
le soir venu. Nul ne sait où ils vont.

Tagsüber treibt es faul vor sich hin, nachts fliegt es
mit anderen umher. Niemand weiß wohin.

Durante el día está somnoliento, pero por la noche
sale volando en grupo, aunque nadie sabe adónde.

Di giorno fluttua con aria sonnolenta, ma di notte
vola via in gruppo. Nessuno sa dove vada.

It’s drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in
big groups. No one knows where they go.

昼間は　寝ぼけて　浮かんでいるが
夕方　大群で　飛んでいく。
行先は　だれも　知らない。

ひとや　ポケモンを　のせて　とぶが
かぜに　ながされているだけなので
どこへ　とんでいくか　わからない。

사람이나 포켓몬을 태우고 날지만
바람에 떠밀려 다닐 뿐이므로
어디로 날아갈지 모른다.

où il va atterrir car il ne fait que flotter.

Es trägt Menschen und Pokémon im Flug. Da es sich aber nur
vom Wind tragen lässt, weiß man nie, wo es hingeht.

Transporta a gente y a Pokémon volando, pero, como se deja
llevar, puede acabar en cualquier sitio.

Vola trascinando persone e Pokémon. Poiché si fa portare
dal vento, non si sa dove vada a finire.

It carries people and Pokémon when it flies.
But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.

人や　ポケモンを　乗せて　飛ぶが
風に　流されているだけなので
どこへ　飛んでいくか　わからない。

ゆうがた　たいぐんで　とんでいく。
いきさきは　だれも　しらない。

낮에는 잠이 덜 깨어 떠 있지만
저녁 무렵에는 큰 무리를 지어
날아간다. 목적지는 아무도 모른다.

Il somnole la journée et s’envole en grands groupes
le soir venu. Nul ne sait où ils vont.

Tagsüber treibt es faul vor sich hin, nachts fliegt es
mit anderen umher. Niemand weiß wohin.

Durante el día está somnoliento, pero por la noche sale
volando en grupo, aunque nadie sabe adónde.

Di giorno fluttua con aria sonnolenta, ma di notte vola via
in gruppo. Nessuno sa dove vada.

It’s drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in
big groups. No one knows where they go.

昼間は　寝ぼけて　浮かんでいるが
夕方　大群で　飛んでいく。
行先は　だれも　知らない。

フワライドに　のって　たびにでた
おとこが　そのまま　ゆくえふめいに
なったという　じけんが　ある。

둥실라이드에 타고 여행을 떠난
남자가 그대로 행방불명이
되었다는 사건이 있다.

曾經發生過乘著隨風球
出發旅行的男人就這樣
失蹤的事件。

Un jour, un homme a grimpé sur un Grodrive
pour partir en voyage. Personne ne l’a jamais
revu.

Einst stieg ein Mann auf ein Drifzepeli
und brach zu einer Reise auf.
Er wurde nie wieder gesehen.

Hubo un caso de un chico que se subió a un
Drifblim y salió de viaje. Desde entonces está
en paradero desconocido.

Si racconta di un uomo che un giorno è volato via
in groppa a un Drifblim. Di lui non si è saputo
più nulla.

There was once an incident in which a man
took a trip riding a Drifblim, only to go missing.

フワライドに　乗って　旅に出た
男が　そのまま　行方不明に
なったという　事件が　ある。

曾经发生过乘着随风球
外出旅行的男人就这么
行踪不明的事件。

ゆうぐれに　とぶ　フワライドの
たいぐんは　じっと　かんさつして
いても　いつのまにか　きえている。

석양을 나는 둥실라이드의
큰 무리는 가만히 관찰하고
있어도 어느새 사라져있다.

日暮時分飛行的大群隨風球，
即使一直盯著觀察，
也會在一不留神間消失。

Même si à la tombée de la nuit on peut observer
des nuées entières de Grodrive, elles finissent
toujours par s’évanouir dans la nature.

Bemerkt man einen in der Dämmerung driftenden
Schwarm von Drifzepeli, verschwindet dieser
auch wieder sogleich.

Al anochecer, se reúnen en grupos y vuelan a la
deriva. Si alguien trata de seguirlos con la
mirada, desaparecen al instante.

Se si osservano attentamente i gruppi di Drifblim
trascinati dal vento al tramonto, si noterà che a
un certo punto svaniscono nel nulla.

Even while under careful observation, large
flocks of Drifblim flying at dusk will inexplicably
disappear from view.

夕暮れに　飛ぶ　フワライドの
大群は　じっと　観察して
いても　いつのまにか　消えている。

日暮时分飞行的大群随风球，
即使一直盯着观察，
也会在一不留神间消失。

ゆうやみを　かぜに　のって　とぶ
フワライドに　つかまると　あのよへ
はこばれるという　ウワサだ。

땅거미 진 후 바람을 타며 날아다니는
둥실라이드에게 잡히면 저세상으로
데려간다는 소문이다.

傳說如果被乘著風
在暮色裡飛行的隨風球捉住，
就會被帶到陰間去。

Si l’on en croit la rumeur, il serait possible de
se rendre dans l’au-delà en se laissant porter
par le vent nocturne, accroché à un Grodrive.

Gerüchten zufolge wird man ins Jenseits
mitgenommen, wenn man sich an einem
Drifzepeli festhält, das im Abendwind driftet.

Se rumorea que los Drifblim que surcan el cielo
al ocaso llevan a todos aquellos que atrapan al
más allá.

Gira voce che afferrando un Drifblim mentre
vola trasportato dal vento al crepuscolo si
venga condotti nell’aldilà.

There’s a rumor that if you catch a Drifblim
floating on the wind at dusk, you’ll be carried
away to the afterlife.

夕闇を　風に　乗って　飛ぶ
フワライドに　捕まると　あの世へ
運ばれるという　ウワサだ。

谣传说，如果被乘着风
在暮色里飞行的随风球捉住，
就会被运送往那个世界。

たいないの　ガスの　げんりょうは
たましい。　からだが　しぼんでくると
ひとや　ポケモンを　つれさるという。

체내에 있는 가스의 원료는
영혼이다. 몸이 쪼그라지기 시작하면
사람이나 포켓몬을 데려간다고 한다.

體內氣體的原料是靈魂。
據說如果牠的身體開始消氣，
就會去把人或寶可夢帶走。

Son gaz est essentiellement composé d’âmes. Si
par malheur son corps se dégonfle, on dit qu’il
entraîne humains et Pokémon dans sa chute.

Das Gas in seinem Körper besteht aus Seelen.
Es heißt, wenn sein Körper zusammenfalle,
nehme es Menschen und Pokémon mit sich.

El gas que alberga su interior se compone de
almas. Si su cuerpo se deshincha, arrastra
consigo tanto a personas como a Pokémon.

I gas all’interno del suo corpo sono costituiti da
anime. Si dice che, se inizia a sgonfiarsi, nella
sua caduta trascini con sé persone e Pokémon.

The raw material for the gas inside its body
is souls. When its body starts to deflate, it’s
thought to carry away people and Pokémon.

体内の　ガスの　原料は
魂。　身体が　しぼんでくると
人や　ポケモンを　連れ去るという。

体内气体的原料是魂魄。
据说如果身体变得干瘪，
就会把人和宝可梦带走。

むねんの　しを　とげた　たましいが
あつまった　すがたとも　いわれる。
よいやみを　おとも　なく　ただよう。

억울하게 죽은 영혼이
모인 모습으로도 일컬어진다.
땅거미가 질 무렵 소리 없이 떠돈다.

也有人說牠是萬念俱灰的
靈魂聚在一起的樣子。
會在黑夜裡靜靜地飄盪。

Ce Pokémon, qui flotte silencieusement
au crépuscule, serait né des âmes des défunts
rongés par les regrets.

Man sagt, es bestehe aus den Seelen derer, die
voller Groll verstorben sind. Es treibt lautlos im
Zwielicht dahin.

Se dice que está formado por almas en pena.
Al caer la noche, flota a la deriva en silencio
sepulcral.

Si dice che sia formato dall’aggregazione
di anime che hanno lasciato la vita con dei
rimpianti. Fluttua silenzioso all’imbrunire.

Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls
burdened with regrets, silently drifting through
the dusk.

無念の　死を　とげた　魂が
集まった　姿とも　いわれる。
宵闇を　音も　なく　漂う。

也有人说它是万念俱灰的
灵魂聚在一起的样子。
会在黑夜里静静地飘荡。

ひとや　ポケモンを　つかんで
そのまま　どこかへ　はこんでいく。
いきさきは　だれも　しらない。

사람과 포켓몬을 붙잡아
그대로 어딘가로 운반한다.
행선지는 아무도 모른다.

會抓住人和寶可夢，
然後運到某個地方。
沒人知道那地方是哪裡。

Il attrape des personnes et des Pokémon pour
les transporter vers une destination inconnue.

Es greift sich Menschen und Pokémon und trägt
sie fort. Niemand weiß, wohin.

Agarra a gente y a Pokémon para llevárselos a
algún sitio, aunque nadie sabe exactamente
adónde.

Afferra persone e Pokémon e li trascina via
con sé. Nessuno sa dove li porti.

It grabs people and Pokémon and carries them
off somewhere. Where do they go?
Nobody knows.

人や　ポケモンを　つかんで
そのまま　どこかへ　運んでいく。
行き先は　だれも　知らない。

会抓住人和宝可梦，
然后运到某个地方。
没人知道那地方是哪里。

It drifts along at dusk, perfectly silent. Its transient, melancholy
aspect touches some people deeply—every so often, one will
come upon a song or poem devoted to Drifblim.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
move.short_effect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
move.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

move.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
move.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

move.effect:
User switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  Stat changes, confusion, and persistent move effects are passed along to the replacement Pokémon.

The following move effects are passed:

* aqua ring
* both the user's and target's effect of block, mean look, and spider web
* the curse effect of curse
* embargo
* focus energy or an activated lansat berry
* gastro acid
* ingrain
* being sapped by leech seed
* being targeted by lock on or mind reader
* magnet rise
* perish song's counter
* power trick
* substitute; the doll's HP is unchanged

The replacement Pokémon does not trigger effects that respond to Pokémon switching in.
move.short_effect: Allows the trainer to switch out the user and pass effects along to its replacement.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
move.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.
